blogPost.excerpt: Craftgate, a cloud-based payment gateway, provides you safe processing through a single integration and allows you on growing your business.
blogPost.body: Craftgate, a cloud-based payment gateway, provides you safe processing through a single integration and allows you on growing your business.
blogPost.title: Craftgate - Cloud-based payment gateway
blogPost.author: Hakan ERDOGAN

localize.description: Craftgate是一个基于云的支付网关，通过单次集成为您提供安全的处理，让您的业务不断发展。
Craftgate是一個基於雲的支付網關，通過單次集成爲您提供安全的處理，讓您的業務不斷髮展。

previous.excerpt: The Med&Beyond telehealth app offers you a video visit with an online doctor 24/7 without leaving your home or office. Install our app and access a board-certified doctor on demand anytime, without the need for health insurance.
previous.title: Med & Beyond - Ask a real doctor 24/7

localize.description: Med&Beyond远程医疗应用程序为您提供全天候在线医生的视频访问，而无需离开家或办公室。安装我们的应用程序，随时按需访问董事会认证的医生，而不需要医疗保险。
Med&Beyond遠程醫療應用程序爲您提供全天候在線醫生的視頻訪問，而無需離開家或辦公室。安裝我們的應用程序，隨時按需訪問董事會認證的醫生，而不需要醫療保險。

next.excerpt: Rent Smart. Rest Easy. Renting can feel like you're not in control. Learn and share about the experiences that others have had. A large portion of your income goes to rent. Increase the transparency available to know where you're investing your money.
next.title: Good Neighbour - Share your rental experience for future tenants.

localize.description: 出租斯马特。睡觉很容易。租房会让人觉得你无法掌控。学习和分享别人的经验。你收入的很大一部分都花在房租上了。提高透明度，让你知道你的钱投到了哪里。
localize.tagline: 与未来的租户分享您的租房体验。

localize.description: 出租斯馬特。睡覺很容易。租房會讓人覺得你無法掌控。學習和分享別人的經驗。你收入的很大一部分都花在房租上了。提高透明度，讓你知道你的錢投到了哪裏。
localize.tagline: 與未來的租戶分享您的租房體驗。
